title: Simplify to single breakpoint and add journey sound effects

requirements.text: Reduce the journey flow to include only one break stop instead of multiple checkpoints, maintaining the existing traveling → break stop → continue pattern

quotes: I need only one Break point

acceptanceCriteria: Journey includes exactly one break stop
Existing BreakStopReachedOverlay component is reused for the single break
Flow progression remains: traveling → break stop → user click → alert → continue → campfire

requirements.text: Add background sound effect that plays during the traveling phase before reaching the break point

quotes: is it possible to add some sounds while traveling at the break point

acceptanceCriteria: Sound plays automatically when travel scene begins
Sound loops or plays continuously during travel
Sound stops when break point is reached

requirements.text: Add sound effect that plays when the break point is reached

quotes: is it possible to add some sounds while traveling at the break point

acceptanceCriteria: Sound is distinct from traveling sound
Existing break stop sound in BreakStopReachedOverlay.tsx can be enhanced or replaced

requirements.text: Add sound effect that plays when the system alert is triggered after the user clicks to continue from the break point
acceptanceCriteria: Sound plays when JourneyHaltIssueOverlay appears after break continue action
Sound indicates an alert or notification state
Sound timing aligns with visual alert presentation

requirements.text: Add sound effect that plays when reaching the final campfire destination
acceptanceCriteria: Sound plays when CampfireEndScreen component is displayed
Sound complements the celebratory campfire visuals

constraints: Do not change the overall flow structure after the break point (system alert and subsequent screens remain the same)
Reuse existing components (BreakStopReachedOverlay, JourneyHaltIssueOverlay, CampfireEndScreen) without modifying their core structure
nonGoals: Modifying the visual design or layout of existing overlays
Changing the quiz or action system in JourneyHaltIssueOverlay
